argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fprodeq0g.kph | |- F/ k ph |
| 2 |  | fprodeq0g.a | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 3 |  | fprodeq0g.b | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | fprodeq0g.c | |- ( ph -> C e. A ) |
| 5 |  | fprodeq0g.b0 | |- ( ( ph /\ k = C ) -> B = 0 ) |
| 6 |  | #P_nfcvd | |- ( ph -> F/_ k 0 ) |
| 7 | 1, 6, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_fprodsplit1f | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B = ( 0 x. prod_ k e. ( A \ { C } ) B ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_diffi | |- ( A e. Fin -> ( A \ { C } ) e. Fin ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( A \ { C } ) e. Fin ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A \ { C } ) ) -> ph ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eldifi | |- ( k e. ( A \ { C } ) -> k e. A ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A \ { C } ) ) -> k e. A ) |
| 13 | 10, 12, 3 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A \ { C } ) ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 14 | 1, 9, 13 | #P_fprodclf | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. ( A \ { C } ) B e. CC ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_mul02d | |- ( ph -> ( 0 x. prod_ k e. ( A \ { C } ) B ) = 0 ) |
| 16 | 7, 15 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B = 0 ) |
